title: (x) Didone with very characteristic g - Didoni {Lex}
content:
Sorry for this topic since it should be quite easy, but it’s been doing my head in all day:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105930im_/http:/typophile.com/files/0725891220508523_5628.jpg)

Thanks for the help!
author: xencreative

comments.content:
I think it’s Didoni with a modified ’g’.

- Lex
Well you could be right, my graphic memory might be letting me down. I guess the face i was thinking of is more slanted/italic than this, but the descender of the g is definitely very similar...

Maybe you were thinking of [Goudy Heavyface Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105930/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/lanston_type/ltc_goudy_heavyface_italic_pro/)? It has a similar style descender of the g.
